description: Witness majestic tigers in their natural habitat. Explore the Ranthambore Fort, a historical marvel.

itinerary.plan: Travel to Ranthambore, check into hotel, evening jeep safari
Morning jeep safari, afternoon explore Ranthambore Fort, evening relax
Morning visit to nearby village, afternoon travel back

description: Explore the Golden City, its majestic fort, and sand dunes. Experience camel safaris and Rajasthani culture.

itinerary.plan: Travel to Jaisalmer, check in, explore the fort
Camel safari in the Thar desert, enjoy sunset
Visit Patwon Ki Haveli, Salim Singh Ki Haveli, travel back

description: Escape the heat in this hill station. Visit Dilwara Jain Temples, Nakki Lake, and enjoy the scenic beauty.

itinerary.plan: Travel to Mount Abu, check in, visit Nakki Lake
Visit Dilwara Temples, explore the local markets

description: Explore the magnificent Mughal architecture of Agra Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

itinerary.plan: Visit Agra Fort, explore its palaces and museums

description: Explore the deserted Mughal city, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its stunning architecture.

itinerary.plan: Visit Fatehpur Sikri, explore the Buland Darwaza and Jama Masjid

description: Visit the birthplace of Lord Krishna, explore ancient temples and experience religious significance.
Explore the holy city associated with Lord Krishna's childhood, visit numerous temples.

itinerary.plan: Visit Banke Bihari Temple, Prem Mandir

description: Explore the majestic Gwalior Fort, a historical landmark with stunning views.

itinerary.plan: Travel to Gwalior, visit Gwalior Fort, explore the palaces and museums

description: Explore the architectural marvels of Orchha, a historical town with palaces and temples.

itinerary.plan: Travel to Orchha, explore the palaces and temples on the banks of Betwa river

description: Visit the historical sites of Dhaulpur, explore the palaces and the scenic beauty of the Chambal River.

itinerary.plan: Travel to Dhaulpur, visit the palace and historical sites
